title: Skew: Skiing Contest
question_text:
Bobosaur and Turtle both love to ski. They each raced down the same mountain $25$ times. Bobosaur had a mean time of $87\text{ seconds}$ and a median time of $87\text{ seconds}$. Turtle had a mean time of $104\text{ seconds}$ and a median time of $96\text{ seconds}$.
Which of the following statements is TRUE?

choices.text: It is likely that both distributions have no skew.
It is likely that the distribution for Turtle is left skewed and the distribution for Bobosaur has no skew.
It is likely that the distribution for Turtle is right skewed and the distribution for Bobosaur has no skew.
It is likely that the distribution for Turtle has no skew and the distribution for Bobosaur is left skewed.
It is likely that the distribution for Turtle has no skew and the distribution for Bobosaur is right skewed.
